akn:section.akn:heading: District of Columbia public school services to public charter schools.

akn:content.akn:p: In general. — The Office of Public Education Facilities Modernization may provide services, such as facilities maintenance, to public charter schools. All compensation for costs of such services shall be subject to negotiation and mutual agreement between a public charter school and the Office of Public Education Facilities Modernization.
Preference in leasing or purchasing public school facilities. —
